ygData.subject: Re: [The EverQuest Tavern] Greetings All :)
ygData.msgSnippet: well all My main is a chanter on Xev so id live to play something diffrent. Im going to bring up a BL but do we have a prefrence for race? due to the fact we
ygData.messageBody:
well all My main is a chanter on Xev so id live to
play something diffrent. Im going to bring up a BL but
do we have a prefrence for race? due to the fact we
will want all classes we wont be able to be same race
but does it matter to anybody whether im good or
evil???

--- Record Mark <recordm@...> wrote:
> My father in Law is here in New York visiting from
> Adelaide, Australia. I made a Ranger today on
> Firona, I can change it if he doesn't fit.
>
>
>
> Glenn <chipmeisterneo@...> wrote:
> Happy to go a Paladin if one is required. Otherwise
> a Warrior is ok
> with me.
>
>
> --- In theeverquesttavern@yahoogroups.com, shari
> cupples
> <surreal_heavenliness@y...> wrote:
> > I agree we need to say what we are and where to
> meet.. I have
> decided to be a cleric on it, we need at least a
> war, chanter, and a
> couple of others. As of what race i dont know yet...
> As soon as i get
> my char made tomorrow i will let you guys know my
> name and you can
> add to friends list. For those in Australia, we will
> observe time
> differences and then set up a good time or if need
> be we can make two
> group times and that way those who can be on at a
> certain time can.
> Sue, get back with me on Yahoo! Groups would love to
> be involved with
> making it and stuff............ Shari
> >
> > Glenn Beaumont <chipmeisterneo@h...> wrote:Just as
> a query, do we
> want to work out a starting location or race so as
> to
> > get together easier at the low levels and be able
> to understand
> each other?
> > Just might make life easier.
> >
> >
> > >From: "Gibson, Sara M" <slavende@i...>
> > >Reply-To: theeverquesttavern@yahoogroups.com
> > >To: <theeverquesttavern@yahoogroups.com>
> > >Subject: RE: [The EverQuest Tavern] Greetings All
> :)
> > >Date: Mon, 25 Aug 2003 12:02:39 -0500
> > >
> > >Okay, so what server do you want to do this on?
> Someone mentioned
> the
> > >Role Playing server (Firiona Vie). Is that okay
> with everyone?
> > >
> > >
> > >
> > >-----Original Message-----
> > >From: Record Mark [mailto:recordm@y...]
> > >Sent: Monday, August 25, 2003 11:44 AM
> > >To: theeverquesttavern@yahoogroups.com
> > >Subject: Re: [The EverQuest Tavern] Greetings All
> :)
> > >
> > >
> > >
> > >I am game too. I live on the East Coast, NY.
> Usually play at night
> > >
> > >Glenn Beaumont <chipmeisterneo@h...> wrote:Sounds
> like a good
> > >idea to me. I have only the one character (17 HE
> Paladin
> > >- Aaerin - Kane Bayle server) and I think it
> would be great to
> find a
> > >server
> > >and play as a group. Only problem being that
> coordinating times on
> line
> > >would be kind of hard I suppose.
> > >
> > >
> > > >From: shari cupples <surreal_heavenliness@y...>
> > > >Reply-To: theeverquesttavern@yahoogroups.com
> > > >To: theeverquesttavern@yahoogroups.com
> > > >Subject: Re: [The EverQuest Tavern] Greetings
> All :)
> > > >Date: Fri, 22 Aug 2003 04:58:13 -0700 (PDT)
> > > >
> > > >HMMMMMMMMMM................ maybe we can all
> make a new char and
> pick
> > >one
> > > >particular server for everone to meet at and
> group with. I think
> that
> > >would
> > > >be really neat. We could meet one day a week on
> these
> characters, that
> > >way
> > > >we can play our others too. I know some of you
> already have 5
> > >characters.
> > > >But you can delete to make a new character. I
> have done that to
> move to
> > >
> > > >different server. Now i only have 2 charcaters,
> so ie easy for
> me to go
> > >to
> > > >different server to make a new character. I
> thought this would
> be a
> > >neat
> > > >idea, kinda like a club thing.... Well, let me
> know you guys
> what you
> > >think
> > > >and we can decide if we would like to try this.
> Surreal
> > > >
> > > >
> > > >
> > > >Hmmi would say first to go to www.eqdruids.com
> if you dont
> already
> > > >know about it. It is a terrific druid only
> site. In the messages
> > > >boards they have sticky post about where to
> hunt at your general
> lvl.
> > > >Not for sure but at 41 i think i was quadding
> snow cougers in ice
> > > >clad or maybe the specs in oasis. After them i
> went to timoruos
> deep
> > > >and started quadding spirocs. That took me to
> all the way to 51
> xp
> > > >slows down at about 50 51 on the spirocs but i
> know can take you
> to
> > > >52 as i am about to ding it there. Or you can
> start trying the
> > > >raptors in that same zone also. I havent tried
> them yet but read
> that
> > > >it can be done. If you want to make some money
> and xp head to
> cobalt
> > > >scar and quad the wyverns. Save the pelts and
> sell them in
> bazaar and
> > > >sell the gems to vendors for about 40plat. This
> is a bit more
> > > >dangerous and harder as there is always people
> there farming.
> Unless
> > > >you have killed alot of giants in velious and
> raised your claws
> of
> > > >veeshan
> > > >faction you will be kos to the drakes there and
> they cast on you
> for
> > > >like 300 dam. Do not pull the named wyvern he
> cannot be slowed or
> > > >snared. As far as the wis items i just went to
> bazaar and filled
> in
> > > >the filters one of them you can pick wis and
> all wis items will
> come
> > > >up then just shop away. It will be slow
> quadding till you get
> your
> > > >new aoe spell lightnig blast and lvl 45 when
> you can get kei
> then its
> > > >smooth sailing to 51. Oh there is a good quest
> wis book you can
> hold
> > > >in your off hand adss like 10 wis and somethin
> other would be
> easy to
> > > >obtain at you lvl. Sorry but i forgot the name
> of it next time
> im on
> > > >ill check but can prolly find it on the druid
> site.
> > > >--- In theeverquesttavern@yahoogroups.com, Sue
> <kstiggermom@y...>
> > > >wrote:
> > > > > ** sigh **
> > > > >
> > > > > I guess I'm the loner. I'm on Drinal &
> Luclin.
